title: Championship Riven
body: So basicly i play since season 2 and i love Riven i play with her 24/7 for 4 years i have all her skins , shes my backgroound in my phone in my computer and its my icon on skype also i have tons of drawings of her and her sword, all over this 4 years i played with her xD, and i would love to have championship Riven but i cant find a way of having it, can you guys help me out finding a way to have it ?

replies.body: I have it, and I would totally give it to you. I'm a terrible Riven :'(

> [{quoted}](name=Dediguise,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VAgcjms6,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-02-20T00:50:50.813+0000)
>
> I have it, and I would totally give it to you. I'm a terrible Riven :'(

Thanks apretiate it :) and you can get better with it it just takes practice :)

Like Katey said, there's no way to get it. Do *not* attempt to buy a CS Riven code; all codes have been disabled and they are trying to scam you. Even before they were discontinued, code selling was a huge scam, which is why it was closed.

She may return in the future, but atm she is a Limited skin with no way to be acquired. Last Worlds she was actually given away if you were able to make a perfect pick in the Worlds Pick'em (select the winner of every match). Only *one* person got it.
and even better, the person that DID get it, already owned championship riven.
For real xD, i would literaly sell my soul to satan for it

Hey Jukexx - 

Unfortunately, there isn't a way to obtain her at this time.
Like you can't give it or sell it to him... He is Riven main godammit, who else than him should own this skin? You are only promoting account selling by this behaviour.
I would do anithing for it, if theres any possible thing to do, i can also pay for it.
I would give my 2 legs and 1 kidney  for the championship Riven
